components.Alert:
# Alert Styling Alert component provides a few different flavors to use, this includes one for displaying success messages, information's and errors or problems. ```tsx // adwaita-web@0.1.1-canary-83f07fb4b5a2324370770d2358c58f1bf3cb18f5.0 import { Alert } from "adwaita-web"; export default () => { return (
This is a simple neutral alert with no content specific styles applied. This is a information alert. This is a success alert. This is a warning alert. This is a danger alert.
); }; ```
